department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) (SPAC)
short_summary: Appraisal of an evaluation property known as DND- Goose Spit site.
description: Appraisal report of the real property known as Department of National Defence (DND) \u2013 Canadian Armed Forces Base Comox (CFB  Comox) Goose Spit (HMCS Quadra) Site, to be presented to the client .
full_summary:
=====================================

**Appraisal of Goose Split Property**
--------------------------------------

*   **Reference Number**: WS4157710617-Doc4220469236
*   **Publication Date**: September 19, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: September 27, 2023, at 14:00:00
*   **Region**: British Columbia

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

*   **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Transaction Overview**
-----------------------

The Government of Canada invites proposals for a market value appraisal report regarding the real property known as Department of National Defence (DND) – Canadian Armed Forces Base Comox (CFB Comox) Goose Spit (HMCS Quadra) Site.

### Purpose and Scope

The following key aspects of this transaction are outlined in a manner to help you better understand it:

*   The purpose of this solicitation is to engage a service provider to conduct a market value appraisal of the specified real property.
*   The selected service provider will be required to submit a detailed report that accurately assesses the value of the real property based on international, national, and provincial appraisal standards and practices.

### Commercial Evaluation

The Department will evaluate bids on the following criteria:

*   The service provider’s technical capacity and expertise
*   The bidder's proposed approach and methodology for conducting the appraisal
*   The bidder's understanding of the specific requirements outlined in the solicitation
*   The price proposed by the bidder

**Notice**
----------

For more information, please refer to the comprehensive notice document on the Ariba Discovery Platform (link provided below).

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17492230?extsite=MTc0OTIyMzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that bids that do not comply with the requirements outlined in the notice will be rejected. 

Merit and price will be evaluated together, following the highest combined rating procurement process.

**Commercial Agreement**
----------------------

Any commercial agreement arising from this transaction must respect the following trade agreements:

*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on
